servinfo.title: Fuel Pump Assembly Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Fuel Pump On-Vehicle Inspection:M16A and J20A

attention1.ptxt: Before starting the following procedure, be sure to observe Precautions on Fuel System Service:M16A and J20A in order to reduce the risk or fire and personal injury.

s1.ptxt: Remove fuel tank from vehicle Refer to Fuel Tank Removal and Installation:M16A and J20A .
Disconnect fuel feed pipe (1) and fuel return pipe (J20A) (3) from fuel pump assembly (2) referring to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting:M16A and J20A .
Disconnect fuel suction hose (2) referring to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting:M16A and J20A .
Remove fuel pump assembly (1) from fuel tank.

attention2.ptxt: When connecting joint, clean outside surface of pipe where joint is to be inserted, push joint into pipe till joint lock clicks and check to ensure that pipes are connected securely, or fuel leak may occur.

s1.ptxt: Clean mating surfaces of fuel pump assembly (1) and fuel tank.
Put plate (2) on fuel pump assembly (1) by matching the protrusion of fuel pump assembly (3) to plate hole (4) as shown.
Install new gasket (2) and fuel pump assembly (1) with plate (3) to fuel tank (4).
Connect fuel feed pipe (1) and fuel return pipe (J20A) (3) to fuel pump assembly (2).
Install fuel tank to vehicle. Refer to Fuel Tank Removal and Installation:M16A and J20A .
